utterance.content: But the evidence –

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: No, it was – it was planted there to lead us to Ben. He wants us to think it’s over. He wants us to drop our guard. He wants to make a big scene. “Nikki will burn.” Beckett.

utterance.speaker: MARTHA
utterance.content: Oh, God.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Montgomery took the detail off her place. She’s alone.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Call the precinct. Tell them to get over there right away. Tell them we were wrong. Tell them the killer’s still alive. You lock this door behind me. Don’t let anyone in.

utterance.speaker: MARTHA
utterance.content: Captain Montgomery, please. Yes, tell him it’s an emergency.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Come on, Beckett. Pick up. Pick up the phone. Pick it up!

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: What, Castle?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: It wasn’t Ben Conrad. He’s not the killer! The killer’s still alive! The killer’s still alive!

utterance.speaker: MALE VOICE IN A CELL PHONE
utterance.content: Goodbye, Nikki. Goodbye, Nikki.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Kate!
